definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: So it's going to be the case for any irreversible engine.
sentences.chinese: 這對所有不可逆熱機都成立。

sentences.english: And side by side, we're going to run another engine.
sentences.chinese: 與它並列的，有另一臺熱機。

sentences.english: So generalize our Carnot engine results.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們推廣卡諾熱機的結果。

sentences.english: So use work out of right-hand side to run left-hand backward.
sentences.chinese: 利用右邊輸出的功，來驅動左邊的熱機反方向運行。

sentences.english: Thermal engine is the drive-device of AUV driven by temperature difference energy.
sentences.chinese: 熱機是溫差能驅動水下監測平臺的動力裝置。

sentences.english: We're building up to entropy and to engines, Carnot cycles, etcetera.
sentences.chinese: 我們要研究，熵，熱機，卡洛循環等概念。

sentences.english: But, in his spare time, he built heat engines in his home workshop.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在他閒暇之餘，他會在自己的工作室建造熱機。

sentences.english: In Chapter 2, we propose a finite-time thermodynamics model for a Diesel heat engine cycle.
sentences.chinese: 第二章建立狄塞爾熱機循環的有限時間熱力學模型。

sentences.english: The experimental results are well accordant with the thermal analysis of the microcantilever unit.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果與熱機械模型的分析一致。

sentences.english: By heat engine people mean an engine converting heat energy into mechanical work.
sentences.chinese: 熱機是指把熱能轉變爲機械功的一種發動機。

sentences.english: According to the second law of thermodynamics, a heat engine can generate power from this temperature difference.
sentences.chinese: 根據熱力學第二定律，一個熱機發電可以從這個溫差。

sentences.english: A cycle model of an irreversible Brayton heat engine working with harmonic systems is established in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 建立了一種不可逆諧振子系統布雷頓熱機循環模型。

sentences.english: Carnot's Theorem discusses the extreme value of the efficiency of heat engines' cycles.
sentences.chinese: 根據卡諾定理給出了熱機的循環效率極大值問題。

sentences.english: In a real engine, of course, you can approach the reversible limit.
sentences.chinese: 在一個真實的熱機裏，當然，你可以達到可逆極限。

sentences.english: All heat engines use the expansion of gases to convert heat energy into mechanical energy.
sentences.chinese: 所有熱機都利用氣體膨脹來把熱能轉換爲機械能。

sentences.english: In this paper, characteristic of equivalent heat drop calculation of reheat unit is analysed.
sentences.chinese: 對再熱機組等效熱降計算特性作了簡要分析。
